style: Woven: Purses, Card Cases, Small Objects
title: Sewing case
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, wool
Technique: woven
description: Small, egg-shaped case, flat on one side with a top of blue silk and metallic thread in a small stylized floral design. The back is faced with a fragment of patterned silk. Attached to this a small faded pink taffeta case with a drawstring closure. Case holds three pieces of bright red wool, probably for needles.
name: Sewing case
